Description: Ostracon, fragment (two pieces joined) of the shoulder-section of pale-red pottery vessel, fabric is grey in section, interior very worn, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as year 8 wine of the Aten domain from the western river.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 47
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393177) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393177)
